    @allure.title("Test to complete the job having repeated task")
    @allure.description("This test case verify that if user can complete the job having completed repeated task")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cvw0x8t")
    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.job
    @pytest.mark.repeat_task
    @pytest.mark.complete_job_having_repeat_task
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("job_execution_by, users_list", [("user", [Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01")]),
                                                              ("user_group", [])])
    def test_complete_job_having_repeat_task(self, user_group_creation, job_execution_by, users_list):
        process_data = self.process_obj.test_adding_all_parameters_and_publish_prototype()
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.assign_user_and_user_group_to_process(job_execution_by, users_list, user_group_creation,
                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
        self.job_obj.start_job()
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["image_capture"], data=None)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["signature_param"], data=None)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"], data={"value": "qwerty"})
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["multi_line_param"], data={"value": "qwerty"})
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_select_param"], data={"value": "monday"})
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["multi_select_param"],
                                       data={"value": ["gold", "silver"]})
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["yes_no_param"], data={"value": "BSE"})
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["date_param"], data={"value": "01-12-2023"})
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["date_time_param"],
                                       data={"value": "01-12-2023 13:23"})
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["file_upload_param"], data=None)

        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["number_param"], data={"value": "102"})

        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["multi_resource_param"],
